original_title: Dizzy & Bop's Big Adventure: The Great Music Caper
overview: When sweet little Dizzy and smart-aleck Bop meet, the last thing they expected is to become friends. But when they decide to rescue their musical, magical land from an evil villain, the brave duo inspires harmony amongst other instruments far and wide.
title: Dizzy & Bop's Big Adventure: The Great Music Caper
